official_title: A bill to provide for a study of the Corinth Battlefield in the State of Mississippi.
short_title: Battle of Corinth Study Act of 1991

summary.text: Battle of Corinth Study Act of 1991 - Directs the Secretary of the Interior to study the events surrounding and lands involved in the Battle of Corinth fought in Mississippi, on October 3 and 4, 1862. Requires such study to be completed and transmitted to specified congressional committees within two years after funds are made available. Authorizes appropriations.

titles.title: Battle of Corinth Study Act of 1991
A bill to provide for a study of the Corinth Battlefield in the State of Mississippi.
